title: Gonin Hitoyaku Demo Kimi ga Suki - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Drama   Harem   Romance   School Life   Shounen
tags: Academy   Androgynous Characters   Beautiful Female Lead   Charming Protagonist   Clever Protagonist   Confident Protagonist   Cunning Protagonist   Cute Protagonist   Determined Protagonist   Early Romance   Famous Protagonist   Genius Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Hard-Working Protagonist   Harem-seeking Protagonist   Inferiority Complex   Kind Love Interests   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Love Rivals   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Past Plays a Big Role   Polygamy   Pragmatic Protagonist   Proactive Protagonist   Protagonist Falls in Love First   Siblings   Strong Love Interests   Student Council   Tragic Past
author: Ichinichi Senji
description:
On his first day at school Taiga Makihara falls down a manure pit and almost dies. But he is saved by Konoe R. Chika, the perfect student council president that all the students admire. In that instant Taiga falls in love with her, and begins to work hard to be by her side.

But afterwards, he discovers that the perfect president is actually a fake creation of five quintuplet sisters with different personalities and abilitiesâ€¦ Does this mean that the girl Taiga Makihara fell in love with does not exist? After this discovery, Taiga pretends not to realize that the five people he loves are pretending to be one, and will make them all his girlfriends.>
